values.value: Establish a formal access control policy defining rules for granting, reviewing, and revoking user access to Salesforce and its data. ISO 27001 Annex A.9 requires documented access control policies based on business and security requirements.

Document an access control policy covering user registration, authentication requirements, privilege management, and access review procedures. Implement role-based access using Salesforce permission sets instead of broad profile-based access. Establish a quarterly access review process where managers certify that their team members' access levels remain appropriate. Configure an automated deprovisioning workflow that revokes access immediately upon employment termination.
